details.name: Get trending news articles and create a HTML table using Python
details.details:
Explores the usage of :
  • Calling third party APIs using Python
  • Using Python packages for operations like creating a HTML page
  • Making Python scripts loosely coupled for easier extension
  • Unit testing Python code
  • Shell script to run the Python script

details.name: A bot with intelligence derived from the LUIS framework and integrating with Dynamics CRM to perform simple operations
details.details:
Explores the usage of :
  • Microsoft Bot framework to create conversational agents
  • Using the LUIS framework to gather intents from the conversations
  • Integrate with Dynamics CRM (Microsoft's CRM solution) to process the intent
